articles.title: 12 things I learned by switching from the $1,400 Galaxy S20 Ultra to the $399 iPhone SE - PCWorld
articles.description: Switching from the most expensive Android phone to the cheapest iPhone made me realize a lot about the things I usually overlook.
articles.content: Its been a long time since I used a phone with a 4.8-inch screen and a home button for more than a few minutes. But when the iPhone SE arrived on my doorstep last month, I popped the SIM out of the G… [+9506 chars]

articles.title: ‘Hitman 3’ will return next year to conclude current trilogy - Micky News
articles.description: Agent 47 will make his big return as Hitman is coming January 2021. The assassination game came out in today’s Sony Playstation 5 event.
articles.content: According to the above presentation, Hitman 3 will be Agent 47s most intimate and professional contract in his entire career. The upcoming game will also conclude the Hitman trilogy that started in 2… [+2552 chars]

articles.title: Humble Codemasters Bundle 2020 gives out 12 games for $15 - Micky News
articles.description: The new Humble Codemasters Bundle 2020 is now out, and the bundle includes solid picks from the British developer.
